title: nf-core/phaseimpute pipeline - params.panel schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.panel

panel.errorMessage: Panel name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

chr.errorMessage: Chromosome must be provided and must be a string containing only numbers, with or without the prefix 'chr'

vcf.errorMessage: Panel vcf file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf'

index.errorMessage: Panel vcf index file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf.tbi' or '.vcf.csi'

sites.errorMessage: Panel sites file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.sites'

tsv.errorMessage: Panel tsv file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tsv'

legend.errorMessage: Panel legend file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.legend'

phased.errorMessage: Is the vcf given phased? Must be a boolean
